help-file.title: "ELEMENTAL AFFINITY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Elemental
The Elementalists of Duris have discovered how to attune their physical bodies to the rigors which elemental forces can inflict. After suffering an elemental onslaught, the caster's body will take on the properties of the type of attack that was used, and therefore suffer less from subsequent attacks of the same nature.
